answers.answer: I would call ur dr.  A bad uti can cause preterm labor.  Good luck
Hi thanks I called back in L&D I still got the same answer so I waited & drink lots lots of water my urine color got lighter & back to normal I'm so relieve!:) thanks for the advice:)
Just stay really hydrated.  Drink some cranberry because it helps to flush the bacteria.  Glad ur better.

question: So 34 weeks Gestational diabetes Im getting monitor twice a week at the hospital so today I was there & b4 even we get there I notice a blood in my urine not really much just darker than usual & when I wipe it I notice a dots of blood I told this to my nurse but it seems she's not concern & told me to just drink lots of water & I have been when I got home same thing. Im worried what should I do? Plus the nurse she was kinda rude to me so I don't know...help pls!:(
title: I need help pls! :(
